General.Name: DreamTeam Token
General.Description: DreamTeam is an eSports and gaming recruitment and management network, allowing users to build, grow, manage and monetize their teams. The DTT is an Ethereum-based token that acts as an the sole currency of the platform, used to pay players, teams, sponsors and tournament prizes.

ICO.Description:
DreamTeam is an eSports and gaming recruitment and management network, allowing users to build, grow, manage and monetize their teams. The DTT is an Ethereum-based token that acts as an the sole currency of the platform, used to pay players, teams, sponsors and tournament prizes.

Team:

  • Alexander Kokhanovsky: CEO & Founder 
  • Volodymyr Panchenko: Co-Founder 
  • Andriy Khavryuchenko: Blockchain Architect 
  • Alexandr Baseda: Lead Architect

The Dream Team ICO will begin on the 20th of November and will last for four days. The ICO allocation represents 75% of the total DTT token supply which will be available at a 0.0005 ETH starting price. The ICO funding cap is $75M.

Token Reserve Split:

  • 75% TOKEN SALE,
  • 10% DREAMTEAM RESERVE,
  • 10% TEAM AND EARLY INVESTORS SHARE, VESTED IN 2 YEARS;
  • 5% ADVISORY BOARD & PARTNERS

The Dream Team ICO features a bonus campaign

Bonus Structure:

  • Day 1 - 5%,
  • Day 2 - 3%
